title: Aatrox he ius extremely broken
body: Nerf Aatrox he is extremely broken

replies.body: Didn't they like just nerf him?

Illaoi, Urgot, Nasus, even a decent renek if you wanna beat him in a fight, you could also just buy Executioners Calling/Thornmail

Trynd, Yas, even mao, if you want to out push him, again if you can't beat him, buy Executioners Calling/Thornmail

Aside from the items mentioned above, you can also get Tabi, IBG (if you want a sheen item)

Also, just dodge the Qs, if you can't run out of range, move towards him, reduced damage is better than max damage

Same with his Chain, just walk sideways, its quicker, and at worst you take two proper Qs

He's not hard to beat, you just gotta use your brain
watchu on about, a good nasus beats the shit out of him, also URGOD
